SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package com.floweektracker.main

Class InfoPanelUI

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.main.InfoPanelUI
class InfoPanelUI extends Object
Represents UI of the infoPanel, which shows to the user information about database or planner using.

Fields:
  • infoPanel - contains all components for user interface panel information
  • infoType - contains path to the one of the .txt files with information about database or planner using
  • returnButton - allows to return to the JPanel from the MainPanelUI instance.
Methods:
  • configureInfoPanel() - sets layout and adds components to the infoPanel
  • createTitlePanel() - creates panel with the panel's title
  • createContentPanel() - creates panel with content
  • createButtonPanel() - creates panel with return button

Getters: getInfoType(), getInfoPanel(), getReturnButton()

  • Constructor Details

    • InfoPanelUI

      InfoPanelUI(String infoType)
      Constructs a new InfoPanelUI instance with the specified infoType. This constructor also initializes references to the infoPanel, infoType and returnButton. At the end, constructor uses a configureInfoPanel() method to sets layout and adds components to the infoPanel.
      Parameters:
      infoType - stores type of information, which are shown to the user in created new infoPanel instance.

  • Method Details

    • configureInfoPanel

      private void configureInfoPanel()
      Configures an infoPanel instance setting layout and adding JPanel's from auxiliary methods.
      See Also:
      • createTitlePanel()
      • createContentPanel()
      • createButtonPanel()

    • createTitlePanel

      private JPanel createTitlePanel()
      Creates and returns JPanel container with JLabel titled "INFORMACJE". It is the first of three panels added to the infoPanel
      Returns:
      a JPanel containing the titleLabel.
      See Also:
      • configureInfoPanel()
      • createContentPanel()
      • createButtonPanel()

    • createContentPanel

      private JPanel createContentPanel()
      Creates and returns JPanel with JLabel containing information loaded from infoType path. This panel is the second of three panels which are added to the infoPanel.
      Returns:
      a JPanel containing the textLabel's.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the resource stream for infoType is null
      See Also:
      • configureInfoPanel()
      • createTitlePanel()
      • createButtonPanel()

    • createButtonPanel

      private JPanel createButtonPanel()
      Creates a JPanel with the returnButton allowing to return to the mainPanel from the MainPanelUI. This panel is the third of three panels which are added to the infoPanel.
      Returns:
      a JPanel containing the returnButton.
      See Also:
      • configureInfoPanel()
      • createTitlePanel()
      • createContentPanel()

    • getInfoPanel

      JScrollPane getInfoPanel()
      Returns:
      a JScrollPane containing the infoPanel
      See Also:
      • configureInfoPanel()

    • getInfoType

      String getInfoType()
      Returns:
      the infoType as a String without prefix "/info" ant the file extension .txt.

    • getReturnButton

      JButton getReturnButton()
      Returns:
      a returnButton used to return to the MainPanel in CardLayout
      See Also:
      • createButtonPanel()
      • MainListeners
